page.title: 12TOURISM.
page.content: The{ISLE OF WIGHT}as a whole is very popular with tourists.Many visitors are attracted to the area by the scenery and the beaches. {BROOK}does not receive the same proportion of summer visitors as some of the large resorts, because it is very rural.There are though,many coach excursions which by_pass BROOK along the{MILITARY ROAD}. Also in the area studied is{COMPTON {BAY}which is widely used by Islanders and tourists alike.This bay is populer as it provides fine swimming and a large expanse of sand. {BROOK DOWNS }are used extensively by walkers as they are crossed by many foot_paths.The views impressive.The local golf course also attracts people.
